properties.entry: select count(*) listCount from member where leave_check = 'N' and manager_check = 'N'

select * from ( select rownum rnum , a.* from ( select report_no , report_date , report_type_name , report_post_no , report_reason , mem_userid from report join member using(mem_no) join report_type using(report_type_no) order by report_no desc ) a ) where rnum between ? and ?
